name: Pond (luckfiam)
description:
A meditative game about relaxing and poking a pond. Made for the inaugural A MAZE. Train Jam 2018, South Africa. The jam took place over 30 ish hours on a train from Johannesburg to Cape Town and was themed around nature.

Assets - Sean Goncalves

Code - Liam Kloppers

Music - Dustin van Wyk
